name: eJump Media
tagline: eJump Media - Web Design & Development Agency
description:
eJump is the web design & development one stop shop for your online needs, where we approach your project as one of our own. We're the "behind the scenes"​ digital arm for some of the top agencies and cool clients in the world.
Our team of 15 in-house dedicated web developers and web designers with more than 10 years background in the industry is ready to craft your space through a digital experience to remember.
